name: gestureRecognizer(_:shouldRecognizeSimultaneouslyWith:)
desc: Asks the delegate if two gesture recognizers should be allowed to recognize gestures simultaneously.
declaration:
optional func gestureRecognizer(_ gestureRecognizer: UIGestureRecognizer, 
shouldRecognizeSimultaneouslyWith otherGestureRecognizer: UIGestureRecognizer) -> Bool
